name: lucy the axolotl amigurumi
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
learn how to create lucy the axolotl amigurumi with this free axolotl crochet pattern. this is an easy almost no sew crochet pattern, perfect for beginners. it is also very quick to make, takes about 1 to 2 hours.

you can use any yarn to make it. i made a small keychain mini axolotl from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger axolotl from chenille super bulky plush yarn. the pattern has a full video tutorial included on how to make this cute axolotl  amigurumi.

link to written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-axolotl-crochet-pattern/

link to video:
https://youtu.be/jks4ij3i6qw
